author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Bella Thorne at Kate Summerville skin care clinic in WeHo | Daily Mail Online
text: comments Bella Thorne has been showing off her individual and questionable style recently. And the 19-year-old former Disney star was at it again on Tuesday as she was seen running into Kate Summerville skin care clinic in West Hollywood. The now blue-haired actress wore a pair of ripped grey jeans, a black very plunging T-shirt and a khaki green headband. Scroll down for video Casual: Bella Thorne was seen running into Kate Summerville skin care clinic in West Hollywood on Tuesday She accessorized with a bright red handbag as she carried a denim jacket over her arm. The fresh faced beauty was smiling as she held her iPhone walking through the streets. Her blue hair was styled in a straight fashion and tucked under her headband as she showed off a little bling. Chilled out: The now blue-haired actress wore a pair of ripped grey jeans, a black very plunging T-shirt and a khaki green headband She was seen wearing no make-up as she headed into the celeb hot spot. Kate Somerville is renowned in Hollywood and the successful skin care based salon boasts celebrity clients from Jessica Alba to Olivia Wilde and even Kate Hudson. It's no wonder Bella was headed into the world renowned facial clinic as the former red-headed beauty posted a very real and honest photo to her Instagram yesterday. Quick visit: She was seen wearing no make-up as she headed into the celeb hot spot She shared a photo with her 15 million followers on Instagram that was a very refreshing and honest departure from the picture-perfect celebrity lifestyle we usually see. In the photo the star lay on a white bed while covered in countless bouquets of roses as she sported dabs of white cream on her face. '15 mill on insta:) I love you guys. Thank you for supporting me and my pimple creme hehe,' she hilariously captioned the image. Getting real: '15 mill on insta:) I love you guys. Thank you for supporting me and my pimple creme hehe,' she hilariously captioned the image Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
